publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2640 Roseanna Cunningham: Nuclear Weapons—That the Parliament is opposed to the existence of weapons of mass destruction in Scotland; believes that the existing Trident nuclear system which costs almost £1 billion annually to keep in operation should be scrapped; recognises that a decision on the replacement of Trident will require to be taken within the next UK Parliament; further recognises that the cost of replacing Trident would be over £20 billion, and wishes to register strong opposition to any proposal by Her Majesty’s Government to procure a replacement for the Trident nuclear system.
